R660 ex vat for the full year!
Works out to R55.00 ex vat per month.

 

DESCRIPTION

Includes:

  • Set up,
  • If transferring domain to us, no transfer cost,
  • If you need one, we offer a co.za / .com domain for the first year at no additional cost, (We can help you select one in a little while. You can also use our domain checker a little further down.)
  • Up to 5 gig of hard drive space, (for those with large ecoms, directories and lots of emails)
  • Unlimited website traffic,
  • SSL Certificate included,
  • Anti-Spam Scanner and Anti-Virus on server,
  • Up to 200 mailboxes, (We can help you sort these out in a little while.)
  • Up to 10 MySQL Databases,
  • Up to 30 minutes free web development / support for minor changes to your website for simple content, such as changing your phone numbers / email addresses or some text and pictures. Terms apply.
  • Most important, you get to deal with our wonderful team.

 

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_code admin_label=”Domain Availability Checker” _builder_version=”4.11.2″ _module_preset=”default” custom_padding=”0px||0px||false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”] Domain Availability Checker[/et_pb_code][et_pb_text admin_label=”Important Notes” _builder_version=”4.13.1″ _module_preset=”default” text_text_color=”#111111″ link_font=”||||on||||dotted” link_text_color=”#333333″ header_3_font=”|600||on|||||” header_3_text_color=”#111111″ header_3_font_size=”14px” background_color=”#f2f2f2″ custom_margin=”0px||||false|false” custom_padding=”20px|20px||20px|false|false” locked=”off” global_colors_info=”{}”]

IMPORTANT NOTES

  • These are the product Terms & Conditions.
  • Refund & Return Policy.

[/et_pb_text][et_pb_wc_description disabled_on=”on|on|on” admin_label=”Short Description” _builder_version=”4.11.2″ body_text_color=”#111111″ link_font=”||||on||||dotted” link_text_color=”#333333″ excerpt.rendered:
Domain, hosting and email included. Up to 5 gig space. Up to 200 mailboxes. Click to read full description.
(Works out to R55.00 ex vat per month.)
